<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Scarlet Triad Sniper](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1559)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 56</row>

**Perception** +23; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +22, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +23, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +21

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +5

**Con** +3

**Int** +1

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74)_ (40 arrows), [keys to manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32), _+1 [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_, [good manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32), _+1 [pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=34)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 32 

**Fort** +20 

**Ref** +22 

**Will** +21 

</row>

**HP** 195

**Backshot** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature the sniper can see misses it with a ranged weapon Strike. **Effect** The sniper attempts a ranged Strike against the triggering creature with a –2 penalty.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet; swiftness

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_pick_ +22 ([fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 1d6+10 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_composite longbow_ +23 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 2d8+8 piercing

**Rain of Arrows** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The sniper fires one arrow at each creature they choose within a 15-foot burst. The center of the burst must be within 100 feet of the sniper, but can't be within 30 feet. The sniper makes each attack roll separately. All attacks count toward the sniper's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty increases only after all the attacks are made.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   2d6

**Swiftness**   The sniper's movement doesn't trigger reactions

</column>
name: Scarlet Triad Sniper
